        public static byte[] intArrayToByteArray​(int[] intArray)
        Converts an int array into a byte array. Assumes each integer value fits in a byte. If integer value uses more than 1 byte then only the lowest byte
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isEqualConstantTime

        public static int isEqualConstantTime​(int b,
                                      int c)
        Constant-time byte comparison. The constant time behavior eliminates side channel attacks.
        Parameters:
        b - One byte.
        c - Another byte.
        Returns:
        1 if b and c are equal, 0 otherwise.

      • isNegativeConstantTime

        public static int isNegativeConstantTime​(int b)
        Constant-time check if byte is negative. The constant time behavior eliminates side channel attacks.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte to check.
        Returns:
        1 if the byte is negative, 0 otherwise.
